EmailTemplate.name: Gift Cards
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI! At this time, we do not offer gift cards. We are exploring gift card options for the future though. We would recommend purchasing a gift card from one of our authorized dealers in the meantime. Here are a few of our dealers you may try: Academy, Cabela's, REI, Bass Pro Shops, or Dick's Sporting Goods.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
